patthana8.72:1.1: Naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana8.72:2.1: Naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.72:3.1: Naniyatañca naaniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.72:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
